metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14639 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: AP4_VisualSampleEntry::ReadFields in Core/Ap4SampleEntry.cpp in Bento4 1.5.0-617 uses incorrect character data types, which causes a stack-based buffer underflow and out-of-bounds write, leading to denial of service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
